import os
import subprocess
from importlib.machinery import SourceFileLoader

# pkg=os.environ["OnePath"]+'Research_Projects/34_IceSat2/DownloadScripts/get_ATL06.py'
pkg='./nsidc_icesat2_sync.py'
cmd=pkg+" --user holschuh --track 256 --release 004 --granule 12 --flatten ATL06"

if __name__ == '__main__':
    p = subprocess.Popen(cmd, stdout=subprocess.PIPE, shell=True)
    out, err = p.communicate()
